message: Hi Bob, I'm interested in selling this product to you. I think it's a great opportunity for you to get a high-quality item at a competitive price. I'm willing to offer it to you for $95.
Thank you for the offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to sell the product. I would like to propose a counteroffer of $88 for the product.

Thanks for your counteroffer, Bob. I appreciate your interest in the product. However, I was thinking more along the lines of $92. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make a profit on this sale.
I understand your position, Alice. I'm willing to pay $90 for the product. This feels like a fair compromise given the value I see in it.
I appreciate your persistence, Bob. I'm willing to meet you at $90, but I need to make sure I'm getting a good deal. I'll tell you what - I'll meet you at $91, but that's as low as I can go.
